summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eighteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street; Sixteenth Avenue Northwest and Seventeenth Avenue Northwest, each from West Sixty-seventh Street to West Seventy-fifth Street; West Seventieth Street and West Seventy-third Street, each from Fifteenth Avenue Northwest to Nineteenth Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with all necessary crosswalks and surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1688 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
